content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)), and pipes connecting them.

### Furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of stone-furnace(position (60.0, -60.0)) and burner-inserter(position (60.5, -61.5)).

### Belt at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two transport belts(position (63.5, -53.5) and position (64.5, -53.5)).


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler or steam engine
- Ensure there is coal in the inventory to refuel the boiler.
- Ensure the boiler and steam engine are connected with pipes to transfer fluids.
- Ensure the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections.

### Errors when checking entity status
- Check the entity status to ensure it is working correctly before attempting to use it.


### NAMESPACE
- `coal_in_inventory`: boolean, indicates whether there is coal in the inventory.
- `boiler_status`: EntityStatus, indicates the status of the boiler.
- `steam_engine_status`: EntityStatus, indicates the status of the steam engine.
- `pipe_connections`: list of positions, indicates the connections between pipes.
- `entity_positions`: dictionary, maps entity names to their positions.
- `fluid_systems`: dictionary, maps fluid system IDs to their properties.
- `electricity_groups`: dictionary, maps electricity group IDs to their properties.
